name: Vegetables
description: Almost all vegetables are best when harvested early in the morning.

name: Fruits
description: Preharvest drop of these fruits can be delayed by application of dilute sprays

name: Spices
description: A spice may be available in several forms: fresh, whole dried, or pre-ground dried.

name: Food Grains / Cereals
description: Pulses are annual crops that yield between one and 12 grains or seeds.
